data.Sentence_cn: 时速70英里
data.Sentence: --- lesson 129  Seventy miles an hour

data.Sentence_cn: 瞧，加里！
data.Sentence: Look, Gary!

data.Sentence_cn: 那个警察正朝你挥手呢。
data.Sentence: That policeman's waving to you.

data.Sentence_cn: 他要你停下来。
data.Sentence: He wants you to stop.

data.Sentence_cn: 你认为你现在是在哪儿？
data.Sentence: Where do you think you are?

data.Sentence_cn: 在赛车道上吗？
data.Sentence: On a race track?

data.Sentence_cn: 你刚才一定是以每小时70英里的速度开车。
data.Sentence: You must have been driving at seventy miles an hour.

data.Sentence_cn: 我不会开得那么快的。
data.Sentence: I can't have been.

data.Sentence_cn: 我是以每小时80英里的速度赶上你的。
data.Sentence: I was doing eighty when I overtook you.

data.Sentence_cn: 难道你没看见限速牌吗？
data.Sentence: Didn't you see the speed limit?

data.Sentence_cn: 恐怕我没有看见，警官。
data.Sentence: I'm afraid I didn't, officer.

data.Sentence_cn: 我一定思想开小差了。
data.Sentence: I must have been dreaming.

data.Sentence_cn: 警官，他思想没有开小差。
data.Sentence: He wasn't dreaming, officer.

data.Sentence_cn: 我刚才正告诉他开慢点。
data.Sentence: I was telling him to drive slowly.

data.Sentence_cn: 所以我才没看见那牌子。
data.Sentence: That's why I didn't see the sign.

data.Sentence_cn: 让我看一看你的驾驶执照。
data.Sentence: Let me see your driving licence.

data.Sentence_cn: 这次我就不罚你款了。
data.Sentence: I won't charge you this time.

data.Sentence_cn: 但你最好不要再开得这样快。
data.Sentence: But you'd better not do it again!

data.Sentence_cn: 谢谢您。我以后一定会多加注意。
data.Sentence: Thank you. I'll certainly be more careful.

data.Sentence_cn: 加里，我刚才叫你开慢点吧。
data.Sentence: I told you to drive slowly, Gary.

data.Sentence_cn: 你总是叫我开慢点，亲爱的。
data.Sentence: You always tell me to drive slowly, darling.

data.Sentence_cn: 好啦，下次你最好还是听从我的劝告吧！
data.Sentence: Well, next time you'd better take my advice!
